scripts.compile: node -e "const p=require('path'); const bin=p.join(__dirname,'./.bin/circom'); const libLocal = p.join(__dirname,'src'); const libNodeModules = p.join(__dirname,'..','node_modules','circomlib','circuits'); const fs=require('fs'); const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const useLocalBin = fs.existsSync(bin) && process.platform !== 'linux'; const circomCmd = useLocalBin ? bin : '/usr/local/bin/circom'; const args = ['-l', libLocal, '-l', libNodeModules, p.join('src','ExamProof.circom'),'--r1cs','--wasm','--sym','-c','-o','build/']; process.exit(spawnSync(circomCmd, args, {stdio:'inherit'}).status);"
scripts.ci-local:full: yarn ci-local:build && yarn ci-local:compile && yarn ci-local:setup && yarn ci-local:zkp-e2e
scripts.ci-local:zkp-e2e: yarn ci-local:gen-proof && yarn ci-local:verify-proof && yarn ci-local:onchain-verify
scripts.docker:smoke: docker run --rm -v $(cd .. && pwd):/work -w /work lvp-circuits:local bash -lc "cd circuits && ./scripts/verify-binaries-local.sh && yarn ci-local:gen-proof"
scripts.docker:zkp-e2e: docker run --rm -v $(cd .. && pwd):/work -w /work lvp-circuits:local bash -lc "cd circuits && yarn ci-local:full"
